resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3416</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1973- the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1973- der Nobelpreis in 
der Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1973- le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1973- o prêmio de 
nobel no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1973- il premio Nobel 
nella fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1973- το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1973- el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done byKarl von Frisch, Konrad Lorenz and Nikolaas Tinbergen
 which won them the Nobel Prize for their discoveries concerning "organization and elicitation of individual and social behaviour patterns</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animal behavior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social behaviour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über das Forschung erfolgte byKarl
von Frisch, Konrad Lorenz und Nikolaas Tinbergen, die sie der 
Nobelpreis für ihre Entdeckungen hinsichtlich sind "der Organisation 
und des elicitation der einzelnen und Sozialverhaltenmuster gewannen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur le von de byKarl fait 
par recherche Frisch, Konrad Lorenz et Nikolaas Tinbergen qui les ont 
gagnées le prix Nobel pour leurs découvertes au sujet 
d'"organisation et d'elicitation de différentes et sociales 
configurations de comportement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação no byKarl feito pesquisa von Frisch,
Konrad Lorenz e Nikolaas Tinbergen que os ganharam o prêmio de nobel 
para suas descobertas a respeito da "organização e do elicitation de
testes padrões individuais e sociais do comportamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sul byKarl fatto ricerca von 
Frisch, Konrad Lorenz e Nikolaas Tinbergen che le hanno vinte il 
premio Nobel per le loro scoperte riguardo "all'organizzazione ed al 
elicitation di diversi e modelli sociali di comportamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για το γίνοντα έρευνα byKarl βον 
Frisch, Konrad Lorenz και Nikolaas Tinbergen που τους 
κέρδισαν το βραβείο Νόμπελ για τις ανακαλύψεις τους σχετικά με 
"την οργάνωση και την απόκτηση των μεμονωμένων και κοινωνικών 
προτύπων συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información sobre el byKarl hecho investigación
von Frisch, Konrad Lorenz y Nikolaas Tinbergen que las ganaron el 
premio Nobel para sus descubrimientos referentes la "organización y 
al elicitation de los modelos individuales y sociales del 
comportamiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierverhalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialverhalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comportement animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comportement social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prix Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comportamento animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comportamento social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prêmio De Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comportamento animale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comportamento sociale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωική συμπεριφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνική συμπεριφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραβείο Νόμπελ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comportamiento animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comportamiento social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
